structure.unit: RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, AND EDUCATIONAL SOCIETIES -- NONSTOCK, NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS

law.catch_line: Uniformity of application and construction of the Kentucky Uniform Prudent Management of Institutional Funds Act.
law.text: In applying and construing this uniform act, consideration shall be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 9, effective July 15, 2010.
